# SampleConfs - Schools & Organizations

Config files related to sects/schools, their systems, buildings, and management.

## School Core
- **SchoolType.json** - School types and classifications
- **SchoolName.json** - School naming
- **SchoolSmall.json** - Small school configs
- **SchoolLog.json** - School logging

## School Scale & Growth
- **SchoolCurScale.json** - Current scale
- **SchoolInitScale.json** - Initial scale
- **SchoolLocalScale.json** - Local scaling
- **SchoolNextAreaParam.json** - Area expansion

## School Buildings
- **SchoolBuilding.json** - General buildings
- **SchoolEquipRoom.json** - Equipment room
- **SchoolGeologyRoom.json** - Geology room
- **SchoolHospital.json** - Hospital
- **SchoolLibrary.json** - Library
- **SchoolLibrarySub2.json** - Library subsystem
- **SchoolLibraySub.json** - Library additional
- **SchoolMainHall.json** - Main hall
- **SchoolStore.json** - School store
- **SchoolSymbolRoom.json** - Symbol room
- **SchoolTrainingHall.json** - Training hall

## School Management
- **SchoolApprove.json** - Approval system
- **SchoolClose.json** - School closure
- **SchoolConsultFAQ.json** - FAQ system
- **SchoolMove.json** - School relocation
- **SchoolParameters1.json** - Parameters
- **SchoolReviveCost.json** - Revival costs
- **SchoolSlogan.json** - School slogans
- **SchoolStand.json** - School standing

## School Posts & Positions
- **SchoolPost.json** - Post definitions
- **SchoolPostParam.json** - Post parameters
- **SchoolPostScore.json** - Post scoring

## School Tasks
- **SchoolTask.json** - General tasks
- **SchoolTask102.json** through **SchoolTask119.json** (18 specific tasks)
- **SchoolTaskHall.json** - Task hall
- **SchoolTaskAllot.json** - Task allocation
- **SchoolTaskAllotCount.json** - Allocation counts
- **SchoolTaskTypeBase.json** - Task types

## School Combat & Conflict
- **SchoolFight.json** - School battles
- **SchoolFightBigElder.json** - Big elder fights
- **SchoolFightDrama.json** - Fight events
- **SchoolFightElder.json** - Elder fights
- **SchoolFightInherit.json** - Inheritance battles
- **SchoolFightPost.json** - Position battles
- **SchoolFightReward.json** - Fight rewards
- **SchoolFightSchoolMain.json** - Main school fights

## School Big Fights (Major Events)
- **SchoolBigFight.json** - Major battles
- **SchoolBigFightDrama.json** - Battle events
- **SchoolBigFightEvent1.json** - Specific events
- **SchoolBigFightReward.json** - Battle rewards

## School War System
- **SchoolWarAreaInfo.json** - War area info
- **SchoolWarBattleInfo.json** - Battle info
- **SchoolWarBoss.json** - Boss encounters
- **SchoolWarBossBattleInfo.json** - Boss battle info
- **SchoolWarBossHumanNum.json** - Human count
- **SchoolWarInfo.json** - War information

## School Inheritance
- **SchoolInherited.json** - Inheritance system
- **SchoolInheritedInfo.json** - Inheritance info

## School Resources
- **SchoolAura.json** - School aura
- **SchoolFixedEffect.json** - Fixed effects
- **SchoolLuckyEffect.json** - Lucky effects
- **SchoolPromoteEffec.json** - Promotion effects
- **SchoolStock.json** - School stocks
- **SchoolStockSub.json** - Stock subsystem

## School Production
- **SchoolMystTreasureProd.json** - Mysterious treasure production
- **SchoolPillOutput.json** - Pill production

## School Special Systems
- **SchoolDragonArtifactDialog.json** - Dragon artifact dialogs
- **SchoolDragonDoor.json** - Dragon door
- **SchoolDragonDoorEffect.json** - Door effects
- **SchoolFate.json** - School fate
- **SchoolTransmit.json** - Transmission system

## School Pets & Beasts
- **SchoolGodBeast.json** - God beast system
- **SchoolGodBeastFeed.json** - Beast feeding
- **SchoolGodBeastFeedProp.json** - Feed properties
- **SchoolGodBeastGetReward.json** - Beast rewards
- **SchoolGodBeastInfo.json** - Beast info
- **SchoolGodBeastInterval.json** - Intervals
- **SchoolGodBeastTalk.json** - Beast interactions
- **SchoolGodExcrete.json** - God excrete system

## School Social
- **SchoolIntim.json** - Intimacy system
- **SchoolIntimEvent.json** - Intimacy events
- **SchoolRoleCall.json** - Role calling

---

**Total:** 100+ files
